entry.title: Yaki Straight Clip-Ins
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Clip In Hair Extensions
Price: 153.00 - 400.00 (21 variants)

Yaki Straight Clip-Ins

Each custom set of clip ins includes: 
Doubled wefts - they're thicker
Grip clips - Perfect for short hair
**Wide wefts - Use one wider clip in rather than many small clips

Regular Set: 100g 
Extra Volume Set: 160g 
Double set: 200g 

** All clip-ins are custom made and require 5-7 business days processing.

entry.title: Kinky Straight Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 106.00 - 218.00 (11 variants)

Kinky Straight Bundle

Our Kinky Straight hair is full textured hair. This hair blends well with natural or relaxed African or black hair textures.. Natural looking weave results are very easy with this texture. This hair can be straightened or curled and when washed it will return to it's original texture. It doesn't shed and with proper care doesn't tangle.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a hair extension bundle? for more information about bundles.

If you are unsure of how many bundles you would need for your weave hairstyle, or the length of hair you will need, check out our bundles guide, or our length chart.

entry.title: Straight Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 91.00 - 205.00 (11 variants)

 Straight Bundle

Our Straight hair is straight, smooth and silky. The texture is a straight, and full from root to tip. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture. Our hair holds moisture and remains silky after washing.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a hair extension bundle? for more information about bundles.

If you are unsure of how many bundles you would need for your weave hairstyle, or the length of hair you will need, check out our bundles guide, or our length chart.

entry.title: Deep Wave Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 96.00 - 209.00 (11 variants)

Deep Wave Bundle

Our Deep Wave textured hair is wavy, and easily styled. The texture is a tight wave, making the hair look very full. The texture is wavy and it holds curls very well. It is also versatile and can easily be straightened or curled, and will return to its original texture when washed.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a Lace Closure? for more information about lace closures.

If you are unsure of how many bundles you would need for your weave hairstyle, or the length of hair you will need, check out our bundles guide, or our length chart.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 96.00 - 209.00 (11 variants)

 Loose Wave Bundle

Our Loose Wave textured hair is wavy, and easily styled. The texture is a loose wave, making the hair look very natural. When washed, it looks like a soft loose curl. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to it's original texture.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a hair extension bundle? for more information about bundles.

If you are unsure of how many bundles you would need for your weave hairstyle, or the length of hair you will need, check out our bundles guide, or our length chart.

entry.title: Body Wave Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 91.00 - 205.00 (11 variants)

Body Wave Bundle

Our most popular luxuriously textured hair extensions. The texture is large wavy and it holds curls very well. It is also versatile and can easily be straightened or curled & washing it brings back the original texture. Body Wave is popular because it holds volume and also looks natural when straight.  

 

More

Kinky Curly Bundle

Our Kinky Curly texture is the perfect blend for the natural look. The texture is a tight spiral curl. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture.

entry.title: Deep Curly Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 96.00 - 209.00 (11 variants)

Deep Curly Bundle

Our Deep Curly textured hair is a favourite for many who love ringlet curls. The texture is a smooth and soft spring curl. This natural looking hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture. It doesn't shed and with proper care doesn't tangle.

More

entry.title: Yaki Straight Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Hair Extension Bundles
Price: 106.00 - 218.00 (11 variants)

 Yaki Straight Bundle

Our Yaki Straight hair is straight yet textured. This hair blends well with black textures hair that has been relaxed/permed. Very natural looking weave results are possible with this texture. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a hair extension bundle? for more information about bundles.
